name: Summon Monster 9
components: V, S, F/DF (a tiny bag and a small candle)
text: This spell functions like summon monster I, except that you can summon one creature from the 9th-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 8th-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.
text_zh:
该法术的功能如同‘召唤怪物I’，不过你能够召唤一个来自9环列表的生物、1d3个来自8环列表的同类生物、或者1d4+1个来自更低等环列表且同一种类的生物。

表：召唤自然盟友

召唤生物亚种召唤生物亚种召唤生物亚种

1环

凶暴鼠 (Dire rat)–巨蜈蚣 (Giant centipede)–矮种马 (Horse, pony)–

犬 (Dog)–火甲虫 (Fire beetle)–蚊蝠 (Stirge)–

海豚 (Dolphin)–螨精 (Mite, gremlin)–蝮蛇 (Snake, viper)–

鹰 (Eagle)–毒蛙 (Poisonous frog)–

2环

野猪 (Boar)–电鳗 (Electric eel)–狼獾 (Wolverine)–

猎豹 (Cheetah)–巨蟹 (Giant crab)–

恐爪龙 (Dinosaur, deinonychus)–巨黄蜂 (Giant wasp)–犀牛 (Rhinoceros)–

凶暴猿 (Dire ape)–狮鹫 (Griffon)–萨特羊人 (Satyr)–

凶暴野猪 (Dire boar)–灰熊 (Grizzly bear)–虎 (Tiger)–

恐狼 (Dire wolf)–狮子 (Lion)–

元素 (中型) (Elemental, medium)元素魔蝠 (任意) (Mephit, any)元素

5环

独眼巨人 (Cyclops)–双头巨人 (Ettin)–披毛犀 (Woolly rhinoceros)–

凶暴狮 (Dire lion)–巨海鳗 (Giant moray eel)–

虎鲸 (Dolphin, orca)–四臂猩猩 (Girallon)–

6环

凶暴熊 (Dire bear)–象 (Elephant)–石巨人 (Stone giant)土系

凶暴虎 (Dire tiger)–巨章鱼 (Giant octopus)–三角龙 (Dinosaur, triceratops)–

7环
